title: High Dependency on UN Aid
description: In 2022, Laos received $100,406.89 from UN agencies, indicating a significant reliance on international aid for development and humanitarian efforts.

title: Low Renewable Energy Production
description: In 2021, Laos had a negative electricity production from renewable sources, excluding hydroelectric, amounting to -4,489,800,000 kWh, highlighting challenges in sustainable energy development.

title: Effective Social Protection Programs
description: In 2018, social protection and labor programs in Laos covered 90.86% of the total welfare of beneficiary households, showcasing robust social safety nets.

title: High Female Learning Poverty
description: In 2019, 97.01% of female pupils in Laos were below the minimum reading proficiency at the end of primary education, indicating significant educational challenges.

title: High Male Learning Poverty
description: In 2019, 97.97% of male pupils in Laos were below the minimum reading proficiency at the end of primary education, reflecting severe educational shortcomings.

title: Severe Male Learning Poverty
description: In 2019, 98.13% of male children at the end-of-primary age in Laos were below minimum reading proficiency, adjusted for out-of-school children, underscoring critical educational deficiencies.
